Comment: The Rolls Royce aerospace company is not the car company.   Rolls-Royce Motor Cars Limited is a subsidiary of BMW. They make rolls Royce cars, this is where there is a tariff exclusion.    Rolls Royce Holdings PLC is an aerospace and defence company. They make jet engines amongst other things. They also do submarines and nuclear reactors.   They have not been the same company since 1973. They are completely unrelated except for name now.
